titleStmt.title: A briefe exposition vvith notes, vpon the second epistle to the Thessalonians. By VVilliam Sclater Doctor of Diuinitie, and minister of Pitmister in Summerset.
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1575-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller, for George Vincent, and are to be sold at the Crosse Keyes at Pauls gate,

notesStmt.note: Usually bound as part 2 of an edition of: An exposition with notes upon the first and second epistles to the Thessalonians.
Cambridge copy identified as part 2 of STC 21835 on UMI microfilm reel 1463.
Reproductions of the originals in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library and Cambridge University Library.
With: An exposition with notes upon the first and second epistles to the Thessalonians / by William Sclater. London : Printed for I. Parker, and are to be sold by George Vincent ..., 1627.

place.placeName: the Crosse Keyes at Pauls gate
